name: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
eligibility: Farmers with up to 2 hectares of land.
documents: Aadhaar card, land ownership papers, bank details.
how_to_apply: Apply through PM-Kisan portal or CSC center.

name: Widow Pension Scheme
eligibility: Women who are widows and below the poverty line.
documents: Death certificate of husband, Aadhaar, income proof.
how_to_apply: Apply at local district office or online on state portal.

name: Ayushman Bharat - PM-JAY
eligibility: Poor and vulnerable families as per SECC 2011 data.
documents: Aadhaar card, ration card or eligibility ID.
how_to_apply: Check eligibility and apply on the PM-JAY website or visit Ayushman Mitra.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
eligibility: Urban or rural poor with no pakka house in family name.
how_to_apply: Apply online via PMAY portal or through CSC centers.

name: Ujjwala Yojana
eligibility: Women from BPL families without LPG connection.
documents: Aadhaar, ration card, bank account details.
how_to_apply: Apply through LPG distributor or online.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
eligibility: Any Indian citizen above 10 years of age.
how_to_apply: Visit nearest bank with documents to open account.

name: National Scholarship Portal
documents: Income certificate, caste certificate, Aadhaar, education records.
how_to_apply: Apply online through the NSP website.

name: PM Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
how_to_apply: Register on Skill India portal and join nearest center.
